contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Sierra Leone}} The '''Young People's Party''' is a [[political party]] in [[Sierra Leone]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://allafrica.com/stories/200107050121.html|title=Sierra Leone: Young Peoples' Party: Can They Rule?|last=Kangbai|first=Jia|date=4 July 2001|publisher=[[allAfrica.com]]|accessdate=24 February 2013}}</ref> without parliamentary representation. == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == *[http://www.yppsl.org/ Official web site]{{deadlink|date=February 2013}} <!-- actually just an advert placeholder --> {{SierraLeone-party-stub}} [[Category:Political parties in Sierra Leone]]
